--- Part 1 ---

```{r}

input |> 
  pmap(range) |>
  map_dbl(~abs(.x[1]-.x[2])) |> 
  sum()

```

--- Part 2 ---

```{r}

e <- "5 9 2 8" |> strsplit(" ") |> unlist() |> as.numeric()

get_whole_remainder <- function(x){
  crossing(a = x, b = x) |> 
    filter(a!=b, a %%b == 0) |> 
    summarise(x = a/b) |> 
    pull(x)
}

input |> 
  pmap_dbl(~get_whole_remainder(c(...))) |> 
  sum()

```
